title: File - Stock Classes
description: JSON containing file type identifier and list of stock classes

items.description: List of OCF stock class objects

items.title: Object - Stock Class
items.description: Object describing a class of stock issued by the issuer

name.description: Name for the stock type (e.g. Series A Preferred or Class A Common)

class_type.description: The type of this stock class (e.g. Preferred or Common)
class_type.title: Enum - Stock Class Type

default_id_prefix.description: Default prefix for certificate numbers in certificated shares (e.g. CS- in CS-1). If certificate IDs have a dash, the prefix should end in the dash like CS-

initial_shares_authorized.description: The initial number of shares authorized for this stock class

oneOf.title: Type - Numeric
oneOf.description: Fixed-point string representation of a number (up to 10 decimal places supported)

board_approval_date.description: Date on which the board approved the stock class
board_approval_date.title: Type - Date

stockholder_approval_date.description: Date on which the stockholders approved the stock class
stockholder_approval_date.title: Type - Date

votes_per_share.title: Type - Numeric
votes_per_share.description: Fixed-point string representation of a number (up to 10 decimal places supported)

par_value.description: Per-share par value of this stock class
par_value.title: Type - Monetary

amount.title: Type - Numeric
amount.description: Fixed-point string representation of a number (up to 10 decimal places supported)

price_per_share.description: Per-share price this stock class was issued for
price_per_share.title: Type - Monetary

amount.title: Type - Numeric
amount.description: Fixed-point string representation of a number (up to 10 decimal places supported)

seniority.title: Type - Numeric
seniority.description: Fixed-point string representation of a number (up to 10 decimal places supported)

conversion_rights.title: Stock Class - Stock Class Conversion Rights Array
conversion_rights.description: List of stock class conversion rights possible for this stock class

items.title: Type - Stock Class Conversion Rights
items.description: Type representation of a conversion right from one Stock Class into another Stock Class

type.description: What kind of conversion right is this?
type.title: Enum - Conversion Right Type

oneOf.title: Conversion Mechanism - Ratio
oneOf.description: Sets forth inputs and conversion mechanism of a ratio conversion (primarily used to describe conversion from one stock class (e.g. Preferred) into another (e.g. Common)

type.description: Identifies the specific conversion trigger type
type.title: Enum - Conversion Mechanism Type

conversion_price.description: What is the effective conversion price per share of this stock class?
conversion_price.title: Type - Monetary

amount.title: Type - Numeric
amount.description: Fixed-point string representation of a number (up to 10 decimal places supported)

ratio.description: One share of this stock class converts into this many target stock class shares
ratio.title: Type - Ratio

numerator.title: Type - Numeric
numerator.description: Fixed-point string representation of a number (up to 10 decimal places supported)

denominator.title: Type - Numeric
denominator.description: Fixed-point string representation of a number (up to 10 decimal places supported)

rounding_type.description: How should fractional shares be rounded?
rounding_type.title: Enum - Rounding Type

conversion_mechanism.description: What conversion mechanism applies to calculate the number of resulting securities?

converts_to_future_round.description: Is this stock class potentially convertible into a future, as-yet undetermined stock class (e.g. Founder Preferred)

converts_to_stock_class_id.description: The identifier of the existing, known stock class this stock class can convert into

liquidation_preference_multiple.title: Type - Numeric
liquidation_preference_multiple.description: Fixed-point string representation of a number (up to 10 decimal places supported)

participation_cap_multiple.title: Type - Numeric
participation_cap_multiple.description: Fixed-point string representation of a number (up to 10 decimal places supported)

comments.description: Unstructured text comments related to and stored for the object

file_type.description: File type field (used to select proper schema for validation)
file_type.title: Enum - OCF File Type
